content: in each stitch skip last double_crochet in top of previous ch2 25 double_crochet row 9 ch2 turn double_crochet in each stitch skip last double_crochet in top of previous ch2 24 double_crochet row 10 ch2 turn double_crochet in each stitch skip last double_crochet in top of previous ch2 23 double_crochet row 11 ch2 turn double_crochet in each stitch skip last double_crochet in top of previous ch2 22 double_crochet row 12 ch2 turn double_crochet in every stitch including in the top of the chain2 22 double_crochet join to first double_crochet rib row are now worked in the round row 13 ch2 counts as first stitch here and next row fpdc around next stitch bpdc around next stitch repeat to last stitch slip_stitch to join row 14 repeat row 13 slip_stitch to join and fasten_off leaving long tail turn inside out and use tail to whip stitch the sleeve closed repeat for 2nd sleeve and that s it all done you may sell your creations but please do not sell or copy my pattern this pattern is for personal use only
